NAME: Nombre
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: Ionic Super Starter is a fully-featured Ionic starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Assemble the various page types you want and remove the ones you don't. We've provided many common mobile app page layouts, like login and signup pages, tabs, and this tutorial page.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Necesitas ayuda? Check out the Super Starter README for a full tutorial
